comments.body:
```suggestion
C++ extends C with the notion of class. If you're used to structures
```

Hi!

Thanks for the review. I'm a Google Season of Docs 2019 applicant. I am interested in helping ROOT with the tasks listed on HSF's [website](https://hepsoftwarefoundation.org/gsdocs/2019/proposal_ROOT.html). I am currently in the process of reading and critiquing the existing ROOT docs.

Would love to have your guidance!

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +9,13 @@

C++ extends C with the notion of a class. If you're used to structures
in C, a class is a `struct` that is a group of related variables,
which is extended with functions and routines specific to this
